column4: Is this the best place to ask short newbie questions about ubuntu?
the only dumb question is the one that doesn't get asked - the ubuntu channels are great places to hang out for general info :)

Great thanks. My first attempt installing linux was redhat back in 2002, and any question I asked anywhere I got mocked and told to RTFM, which were all full of jargon. ubuntu community is great for beginners
bout the same as my first attempt - was with fedora core 2 :\
